Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.name: -numberOfItemsForHorizontalPicker:
Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.abstract: The total number of items. Note that this is read only once, when reload is called.

Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.name: -horizontalPicker:viewForItemWithIndex:
Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.abstract: The delegate must provide a view showing the given item, it should use Auto Layout and at least the width should be defined.

Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.name: -horizontalPicker:recycleView:
Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.abstract: Called after an item view becomes invisible and is removed from the picker.

Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.name: -horizontalPicker:prepareView:
Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.abstract: Called after the given item view is added into the view hierarchy.

Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.name: -horizontalPicker:updateView:centerProximity:
Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.abstract: Called every time the viewport position changes (every frame in case of animation or dragging) with an updated

Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.name: -horizontalPicker:didScroll:
Protocols/MMMHorizontalPickerDelegate.ht.abstract: Called when the picker scrolls to a new offset.

Enums/MMMHorizontalPickerStyle.html#/c:@.name: MMMHorizontalPickerStyleDefault
Enums/MMMHorizontalPickerStyle.html#/c:@.abstract: In this mode all item views define their preferred width via Auto Layout.

Enums/MMMHorizontalPickerStyle.html#/c:@.name: MMMHorizontalPickerStylePaged
Enums/MMMHorizontalPickerStyle.html#/c:@.abstract: In this mode the width of every item will be constrainted to the width of the picker adjusted to contentInsets.

Enums/MMMHorizontalPickerStyle.html#/c:@.name: MMMHorizontalPickerStyleUniform
Enums/MMMHorizontalPickerStyle.html#/c:@.abstract: In this mode the width of every item will be constrainted to the width of the widest item adjusted to contentInsets.

Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.name: contentInsets
Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.abstract: All the item views will be positioned within the rect obtained by insetting the bounds by these insets.

Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.name: spacing
Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.abstract: The distance to keep between two neigbour item views.

Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.name: prototypeView
Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.abstract: Optional view which when set is used to calculate prefered height of the picker.

Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.name: currentItemIndex
Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.abstract: The index of the item closest to the center of the picker’s viewport.

Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.name: -reload
Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html#/c:objc.abstract: Should be called when the number of items change.

Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html.name: MMMHorizontalPicker
Classes/MMMHorizontalPicker.html.abstract: Allows to swipe horizontally through a lot of items ensuring only a handful of subviews are used.
